note:
British, retired, resident in Spain.
Former expatriate in East Africa. Lived for many years in Kenya and Tanzania, worked there and in Ethiopia, Uganda, Zambia and Mauritius.
Malting and agriculture (barley, tea and sisal).
Interests: cycling (modified Brompton enthusiast), our rescue dogs, bird watching, travel, tinkering with computers, photography, reading, simple cooking.
After a lifetime of voting conservative, I am now anti-Tory. I find them more repulsive by the day.
